reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits well, with one noting it's perfect for family gatherings, and appreciate its soft, smooth material that's comfortable and doesn't wrinkle. Moreover, the dress is versatile, suitable for many occasions, and flatters various body types while hiding the belly, making it ideal for winter wear. However, the material thickness receives mixed feedback, with several customers noting it isn't very thick. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice, comfortable and versatile dress
items.body: I'm 5'4 and 115 lbs and ordered a small. It fit true to size and was very comfortable and kept me warm outside in November. It's cute and casual but also can be dressy enough to wear out for a date or to work depending on how you style it. The material is very soft and thick enough that you can't see through it. There was a tiny hole in the one seam along my right side but I easily fixed it was a few stitches and there were no other issues with the dress. Read more
items.author: Reads

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A wonderful dress!
items.body: Loved this dress for my princess peach costume and for just to wear when I go out. The fit was very well on a postpartum body. It hid some of my tummy. The color is true to the photo. Very pink! Though not a neon pink. Its very pretty. It is a good thickness and perfect for the unpredictable weather of early fall/late spring. May be a little cozy for the summer but the length helps. The length of the bottom is modest but not too long. I am 5’3 and 160 if that helps. I am very happy with my purchase! Read more
items.author: Christy R.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute but not what I expected
items.body: This dress is cute and true to size. The one I received is definitely not a ribbed knit sweater dress even though that it the description. Mine is more like a brushed chenille. It is very soft and comfortable. It is a nice heavy material so it will still be good for colder weather. If you are looking for an actual ribbed sweater dress this may not be for you. Read more
items.author: Wyoming 827

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazed
items.body: Oh so soft. And very comfortable. I don't even wear dresses but I will be wearing more than just Halloween. It's absolutely beautiful and fits really well. It won't let me upload the pic of my whole body so that's best I got. But really is a nice dress Read more
items.author: Todd Sanders

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatility and perfect comfort. Soft, true to size and comfortable. A keeper!!
items.body: This dress is SOFT and STRETCHY, true to size and color. I am 5”4” and nearly 130 lbs. The garment is versatile, long enough for full coverage and it is not see-through. Can be worn with a festive belt and bag for holiday events. Leggings/tights add an element of cover for chilly days. I LOVE the sleeve length that matches my leg warmers and 2”heels, also from Amazon. Will surely purchase in another color. Best feature: The ‘give’ and stretch! I can pick up my kids without’ showing off’. Size small is perfect for me although even a medium would fit too, should I have chosen a more casual fit for comfort at home. Length and sleeve length are PERFECT for my 48 year old body… but I’m sure my 13 yr old will likely find it to wear. Regular undergarments are fine, as the dress is knitted thick enough to cover even darker colored ‘undies’. The neural color is as shown and is perfect with a belt, scarf, purse, boots, flats: ANY neutral accessory. Great garment to dress up or down for multiple events and the quality and fit far surpass the price. *Very happy, Amazon. I will be buying another. Read more
items.author: April Marko (Spirit Conduit)

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Adorable flowy dress.
items.body: This dress was super cute. However I did not keep it. I took it out and was disappointed by the material, it was fleece and blanket like. I tried it in for reference to see how it fit. I’m 5’1 and 149lbs wearing a size Large. A little long to be paired with these boots but perfect with other shoes. I did enjoy the fit and how it’s tight on top and flowy on the bottom. Read more
items.author: Reli Arnold

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Figure flattering shape
items.body: Nice thick no- show fabric, cute waist defining shape with flirty skirt. Love this cute somewhat dressy dress. Can be worn well with a belt. Nice above knee length. I’m 5’2”, small size. Very comfortable. Read more
items.author: Baylor Bear

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love love it
items.body: Super cute and fits well. Warm for winter. Hit mid thigh at my finger tips, not too short. Super soft and comfortable. I’m picky with material and this isn’t scratchy at all very soft and smooth. Color looks great for warm skin tones. Read more
items.author: Jamie Baleno

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine, Caramelred, Navy Floral, Blue, Khakicaramel, Apricot, Hot Pink, Black Taupe, Black and White, Black, Navy, Red Plaid, Leopard, White Plaid. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
